resources.string:
PaperworkViewer is a viewer for datasets of the Paperwork document management system developed by Jerome Flesch
 (https://github.com/jflesch/paperwork)

 Developer: Karsten Schwank
 https://github.com/kschwank
 Sources:
 https://github.com/kschwank/paperwork-viewer
